channel.title: Need Help
channel.description: I have a server matrix 718/723 and I am wanting to change the language of the client, I am Brazilian and would like to change the game mode from the client Portuges english for the english game mode and game mode 0 and 3 Portuges would please correct me if I'm wrong more I found it in the file "Class429.java"

item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @austinx austinx
item.description:
@austinx wrote:

[quote=“Matheus Ps, post:7, topic:453066”][quote author=austinx link=topic=555917.msg4069876#msg4069876 date=1344252880]
he’s asking how can he change his client language from English to Portuguese.
[/quote]

Yes.
Thanks for the translation made ​​a mistake using the translator in the post I copied what was written and what had not translated[/quote]

no problem sorry btw that i don’t know how to do this.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @Matheus_Ps Matheus Ps
item.description:
@Matheus_Ps wrote:

[quote=“saciid.1, post:8, topic:453066”]Change all the sendquests, item names, ect to the language, server sided, then client sided, it’d take months tbh, you’d have to do every item name/examine, object, npc.

But sorry I think its only available for English , French and German.[/quote]

in some older servers like 639 and only change the gamemode the client more I do not aminima gamemode where I find the idea of the client 718

Read full topic
